Timeline sync gets new tweets in the background. Only enable this is if you find gaps in your timeline or want notifications about new tweets in your timeline.
Disable auto play when not on Wi-Fi

Warning: disabling power saving mode can cause battery drain and also missed notifications. It is recommended that you set a faster interval instead of disabling it.
Warning: enabling streams over data may cause missed tweets due to instability of data connections

This requires the official Twitter app to be installed." It will replace push notifications from Twitter.
If you have many accounts, make sure they are added to the official app.
Make sure your settings in Twitter are the same, such as enabling \"Tweet\" notifications if you want favourite notifications.
Disable vibrate and sound in the official app to prevent it from buzzing you twice."
"Twitter només permet pujar 4 fotos o 1 vídeo. Al acceptar, s'eliminaran les teves pujades actuals per fer lloc a esta nova."
